maple: nmax:=92: for p from 0 to ceil(simplify(log[2](nmax))) do for n from 0 to ceil(nmax/(p+2))+1 do a((2*n+1)*2^p-1) := n mod 2 od: od: seq(a(n), n=0..nmax); # _Johannes W. Meijer_, Jan 28 2013
